description: Dashboard for JVM metrics with OpenTelemetry instrumentation - also supports micrometer metrics

links.title: Semantic Conventions: 1.20.0 - 1.22.0
links.tooltip: multiple versions of the semantic conventions are supported using 'or' and regex queries

panels.description:
Ratio of currently used to maximum number of allowed connections in the JDBC connection pool.

100% means that all available database connections are in use - and it's likely that there's already a queue of waiting connections.

targets.expr:
sum by (instance, pool_name) (db_client_connections_usage{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", state="used"}) / on (instance, pool_name) 
sum by (instance, pool_name) (db_client_connections_max{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Connection pool utilization

panels.description: 95th percentile of HTTP server request duration in seconds

targets.expr:
(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, instance) (rate({__name__=~"http_server_request_duration_seconds_bucket|http_server_request_duration_bucket|http_server_duration_seconds_bucket|http_server_duration_bucket|http_server_requests_seconds_bucket", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))))
or
(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, instance) (rate({__name__=~"http_server_duration_milliseconds_bucket|http_server_requests_milliseconds_bucket|http_server_requests_bucket", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))) / 1000)

panels.title: Duration (95%)

panels.description: HTTP server error ratio - ratio of requests that return 5xx

targets.expr:
(sum by (instance)(rate({__name__=~"http_server_request_duration_seconds_count|http_server_request_duration_count", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", http_response_status_code=~"5.*"}[$__rate_interval]))) / on (instance) (sum by (instance)(rate({__name__=~"http_server_request_duration_seconds_count|http_server_request_duration_count", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
or
(sum by (instance)(rate({__name__=~"http_server_duration_milliseconds_count|http_server_duration_seconds_count|http_server_duration_count", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", http_status_code=~"5.*"}[$__rate_interval]))) / on (instance) (sum by (instance)(rate({__name__=~"http_server_duration_milliseconds_count|http_server_duration_seconds_count|http_server_duration_count", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))
or
(sum by (instance)(rate({__name__=~"http_server_requests_milliseconds_count|http_server_requests_count|http_server_requests_seconds_count", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", outcome="SERVER_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval]))) / on (instance) (sum by (instance)(rate({__name__=~"http_server_requests_milliseconds_count|http_server_requests_count|http_server_requests_seconds_count", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Error %

panels.description: Percentage of time spend for garbage collection pauses
panels.title: Garbage Collection

panels.description: Used heap memory / heap memory limit

targets.expr:
(sum by (instance) ({__name__=~"jvm_memory_used|jvm_memory_used_bytes",job=~"$job",jvm_memory_type="heap", instance=~"$instance"}) / on(instance) sum by (instance) ({__name__=~"jvm_memory_limit|jvm_memory_limit_bytes",job=~"$job",jvm_memory_type="heap", instance=~"$instance"}))
or
(sum by (instance) ({__name__=~"process_runtime_jvm_memory_usage|process_runtime_jvm_memory_usage_bytes",job=~"$job",type="heap", instance=~"$instance"}) / on(instance) sum by (instance) ({__name__=~"process_runtime_jvm_memory_limit|process_runtime_jvm_memory_limit_bytes",job=~"$job",type="heap", instance=~"$instance"}))
or
(sum by (instance) ({__name__=~"jvm_memory_used|jvm_memory_used_bytes",job=~"$job",area="heap", instance=~"$instance"}) / on(instance) sum by (instance) ({__name__=~"jvm_memory_max|jvm_memory_max_bytes",job=~"$job",area="heap", instance=~"$instance"}))

panels.title: Heap Memory utilization

panels.description: Number of currently executing (also called "live") threads
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: The number of requests that wait for a connection from the pool
panels.title: Connection pool waiting requests

panels.description: CPU utilization for the whole system
panels.title: CPU utilization

list.description: The instance of the application, e.g. pod1
list.label: Instance
list.name: instance

title: JVM Overview (OpenTelemetry)
